title: Policies re: determining FOIL estimated date of production

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any policies, guides, matrices, or training documents concerning how the Department estimates the "statement of the approximate date, which shall be reasonable under the circumstances of the request, when such request will be granted or denied," required by New York Public Officers Law Section 89(3). This request is limited to policies, guides, matrices, or training documents used at the time of this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any processing notes, emails, or communications generated, sent, or received by the RAO responsible for FOIL-2024-056-12344, FOIL-2024-056-12345, and/or FOIL-2024-056-12465, which notes, emails, or communications relate to the records request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh
